Hello ðŸ‘‹ I'm Dylan. I am a full-stack developer from Seattle, Washington. Learning how to code started out as a hobby for me, but I quickly grew obsessed with building things that required both creativity and logic. I recently graduated from Lambda School, a technical skills academy, where I spent 40+ hours a week learning the latest web development trends and fundamental computer science skills to bring my projects to life. I'm currently a Section Lead at Lambda, guiding 20 Team Leads and 150+ students through the school's Full Stack Web curriculum while I continue writing code and building applications.

Check out some of the [projects](#projects) I've worked on! Or head back to the [top](#home) ðŸ‘†
